channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: hugo benchmark Benchmark hugo by building a site a number of times. Synopsis Hugo can build a site many times over and analyze the running process creating a benchmark. hugo benchmark Options -n, --count=13: number of times to build the site --cpuprofile="": path/filename for the CPU profile file --memprofile="": path/filename for the memory profile file Options inherited from parent commands -b, --baseURL="": hostname (and path) to the root, e.
